item.title: Font-ification!
item.description: My journey to the “font"ain of Beauty! :) I love fonts to an almost fanatic extent. Other than meddling with different typefaces, with Serifs & without (‘sans’ 1 Serif), I have been notorious among my friends & peers for my heavy use of colors also to the above mix, giving rise to a ‘psychedelic riot of colors’ in my blog articles & mails. I do all of this—in my effort to somehow produce ‘intonations & emphasis’ of speech in written text, using colors, fonts and their weights & styles as my tools.
